meta.description: Fatigued? Bloated? Depressed? It could be your thyroid. Dr. Gil

title: Thyroid Therapy Revolution with Gil Kajiki
cleaned_text:
Fatigued? Bloated? Depressed? It could be your thyroid. Dr. Gil Kajiki, DC, is revolutionizing the way thyroid dysfunction is handled. Combining endocrinology, immunology and blood analysis, Dr. Kajiki’s truly unique approach leaves patients feeling energized, revitalized and “finally back to normal.” In this interview, he shares how we can spot the signs of thyroid dysfunction, and what we can do to mitigate the problem.

Gil Kajiki, DC, is revolutionizing the way that hypothyroidism and Hashimoto’s Autoimmune Thyroid is handled. His relentless search to help his wife, who had been diagnosed with Hashimoto's Hypothyroid resulted in a new way to manage her symptoms. This led him to develop a truly unique approach that goes beyond thyroid replacement, and actually get to the root problem of Hashimoto's, to help his patients feel energized, vibrant, and truly feel good again.
